alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 8:24PM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region. * WHEN...From 5 AM Monday to 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
